changeSet.author: cah292
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO KRCR_CMPNT_T (NMSPC_CD, CMPNT_CD, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, NM, ACTV_IND) VALUES ('IAS', 'All', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'All', 'Y') / INSERT INTO KRCR_NMSPC_T (NMSPC_CD, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, NM, ACTV_IND, APPL_ID) VALUES ('CYN_APPS', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'Cynergy-Apps', 'Y', 'CYN_APPS') / INSERT INTO KRCR_NMSPC_T (NMSPC_CD, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, NM, ACTV_IND, APPL_ID) VALUES ('IAS', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'InfoAccess Shared', 'Y', 'ias') / INSERT INTO KRCR_NMSPC_T (NMSPC_CD, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, NM, ACTV_IND, APPL_ID) VALUES ('CONFAGREE', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'Confidentiality Agreement', 'Y', 'confagree') / INSERT INTO KRCR_NMSPC_T (NMSPC_CD, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, NM, ACTV_IND, APPL_ID) VALUES ('BSCMS', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'BSC Management System', 'Y', 'bscms') / INSERT INTO KRCR_NMSPC_T (NMSPC_CD, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, NM, ACTV_IND, APPL_ID) VALUES ('DFA', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'DFA InfoAccess', 'Y', 'dfa') / INSERT INTO KRCR_NMSPC_T (NMSPC_CD, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, NM, ACTV_IND, APPL_ID) VALUES ('SDA', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'Student Data Access', 'Y', 'sda') / INSERT INTO KRCR_NMSPC_T (NMSPC_CD, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, NM, ACTV_IND, APPL_ID) VALUES ('CYNERGYDFA', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'SMS Request', 'Y', 'cynergyDFA') / INSERT INTO KRCR_NMSPC_T (NMSPC_CD, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, NM, ACTV_IND, APPL_ID) VALUES ('ITEMTYPE', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'Bursar ItemType', 'Y', 'ItemType') / INSERT INTO KRCR_NMSPC_T (NMSPC_CD, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, NM, ACTV_IND, APPL_ID) VALUES ('CREDITCARD', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'Credit Card Update', 'Y', 'creditcard') / UPDATE KRCR_NMSPC_T SET APPL_ID = 'hrda' WHERE NMSPC_CD = 'HRDA' /
